td.content: grew greater than 100,000 colonies of EColi

td.content: s:pt with C/O Kidney for 4 weeks that is frequent. patient is a white M retired aged 78 yrs. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he is a heavy drinker o:Height 177 cm, Weight 70.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Urinalysis 3.6,positive,positive,positive,protein=20 mg/dL a:Pyelonephritis p:administered Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, performed Urinalysis, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:patient complains of recurrent Kidney over the past month. he is a 79 yo white m. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 72 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Urine culture grew greater than 100,000 colonies of EColi a:Pyelonephritis p:administered LEVAQUIN - 500 mg daily x 10 d, performed Urine culture, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
